Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
totally different. we extend bitcoin's utxo system to create custom consensus modules, the link I posted above.
they had to create a new language to describe contracts that run on chain and interact with the Eth VM, while this created a scarcity for resources like gas and block space, it wasn't required
we simply leverage the native computational capabilities of the full nodes to write modules(that replace contracts) that behave as we need them to

Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: smartcontracts are a subset of what Komodo Crypto Conditiions do. They're customizations that work in the coin daemon. There's no virtual machine. Completely different from all others.

Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: https://komodoworld.blog/2019/02/13/37-differences-between-solidity-and-crypto-conditions/
